privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: At QRGENHUB, we value your privacy. Data used to create QR codes (URLs, vCards, Wi-Fi passwords, etc.) is not stored on our servers. Processes are performed instantly, and data is cleared once the session ends. Cookies are used only for language preferences and anonymous traffic analysis.
terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.content: The free QR code service by QRGENHUB is provided 'as-is'. Users are solely responsible for the content and use of the generated codes. Our service is free for commercial and personal use; however, we reserve the right to restrict access in case of abuse.
footer_tagline: Powerful QR codes for modern products
